title: Basketball FRVR
description: Basketball FRVR is a great new basketball game that you can play on any device. This Basketball Hoop Shooter is simple to learn but a lot of fun. There is no time limit in the game, but the moving basket is a challenge even for experienced players! This means that you can play Basketball FRVR for as long as you want. There are bonus points if you don't hit the rim. The game is made by Chris Benjaminsen. Have fun!
